Posts.Content: Momandwife36 wrote: Hey, was wondering if anyone else has had an extreme numbness in the chest area or on their arms that started a week or so AFTER their surgery? My doctor seemed really vague and unconcerned about the sudden creeping numbness I've experienced and essentially said "yeah, we don't know why that happens, it may or may not go away. As long as you still have function, don't worry." I am very worried because when I feel my skin now, it feels as though I'm touching another person. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Numbness after mastectomy and lymph node biopsy :( Momandwife36 lrwells50
